title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3.2, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, letting you run and chat with local LLMs from Python scripts.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node or browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration layer that wraps Ollama models for chains, agents, and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with synchronous & reactive APIs and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-cli (rust)
summary: Rust crate providing typed CLI and library interface to Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-chat (React component)
summary: Reusable React component for chatting with any Ollama model via Next.js.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for RAG, fine-tuning, function-calling, and edge deployment.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-curl
summary: Collection of POSIX shell snippets showing how to use Ollama via plain curl.

title: ollama-gui (Tauri desktop)
summary: Lightweight cross-platform desktop app for Ollama built with Tauri & Svelte.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: n8n community node to call Ollama models inside low-code automation workflows.

title: ollama-rag-starter
summary: Minimal Python Flask app showing RAG using Ollama embeddings & Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-mcp
summary: Model Context Protocol server exposing Ollama functions to Claude Desktop & friends.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you summarize, translate, or brainstorm with local Ollama models.
